title: Boards Improvement
body: I thought this with the old Forums to. Riot could we please have a button that searches for all the posts we started. I have a hard time tracking posts I posted to see if anyone has responded. That I make summoner names searchable to see posts we've been a part of. K Thx XD

replies.body: Also you can click on your summoner icon to show a list of all your posts.
Top right, below the buttons labelled 'logout' and 'support'. That's your notifications. Will let you know when someone has replied to something you posted.
